business.headline: Buying property for the first time? Must-know financial steps for beginnersStepping into the property market for the first time? Before you sign any papers, make sure you're financially prepared to handle not just the purchase price but the many hidden costs that follow. Here's a beginner's financial checklist to make your property investment a smart one.

NSDL rally hits roadblock after Q1 results, shares tumble nearly 5%After a strong IPO and initial rally, investors are reassessing NSDL's near-term growth prospects in light of mixed operational performance.
Explained: Why Paytm shares surged over 5% todayPaytm's share price rallied nearly 6% after RBI approval, lifting investor optimism amid steady business performance.

Markets open higher on easing inflation; mixed global cues keep investors cautiousThe S&P BSE Sensex initially rose over 300 points but pared some gains to trade 155.05 points higher at 80,390.64 around 9:25 am. The NSE Nifty50 was up 71.60 points to 24,559.

Sunjay Kapur's Rs 30,000 crore fortune without will: Who's likely to gain most?In the weeks since Sunjay Kapur's death, the silence around succession has been broken by a chorus of competing voices: his mother Rani Kapur, his widow Priya Sachdev Kapur, his sisters, and even mentions of his former wives.
Nikkei's share average hits record-high, tops 43,000 for first timeThe Nikkei .N225 on Wednesday rose as much as 1.2 per cent in the first few minutes of trade to reach a record 43,241.27.

Lapses, irregularities, round tipping: Yes Bank's Rs 500 crore loan sale under scannerThe audit found indications that YES Bank may have indirectly financed the purchase of its own stressed asset. The transaction dates back to March 31, 2017, when the bank sold HDIL's non-performing loan, valued at over Rs 523 crore including interest, to Suraksha ARC for Rs 518 crore.

Ambanis retain crown as India's most valuable family business in 2025Mukesh Ambani leads Reliance Industries Limited, which has roots in the energy sector but also has major operations in retail and digital services. Founded in 1957 by Dhirubhai Ambani, the company is now managed by the second generation and continues to be a key force in India's economy.

Sebi rejects Anil Ambani's plea in Yes Bank case, ED probe continues: ReportThe case relates to investments worth Rs 21,500 crore made by Reliance Mutual Fund, then owned by Anil Ambani, in Yes Bank's additional tier-1 (AT-1) bonds between 2016 and 2019.

Retail inflation eases to 8-year low of 1.55% in JulyRetail inflation declined to an 8-year low in July 2025 as food prices plunged sharply. Both rural and urban areas experienced deflation in food prices, with rural food inflation at -1.74% and urban at -1.90%.
Sensex ends 368 points lower, Nifty below 24,500; Maruti down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 368.49 points to end at 80,235.59, while the NSE Nifty50 declined by 97.65 points to close at 24,487.40.
RBI's job gets tougher, thanks to 50% US tariffsRBI kept the repo rate steady at 5.5% and warned that US tariffs and global supply issues could quickly change the outlook.

entertainment.headline: KBC 17: Amitabh Bachchan recalls treating parents to dinner with first salaryThe premiere show of KBC 17 saw Amitabh Bachchan recalling the first time he took his parents out to a restaurant.

Reinvention of Jr NTR: How the star is redefining his image for pan-India audienceJr NTR is set to make a significant impact in Bollywood with 'War 2', starring opposite Hrithik Roshan. This film is expected to elevate his status from a Telugu superstar to a pan-Indian icon, blending action and emotional depth.

War 2: Jr NTR thanks Naidu, Pawan Kalyan for price hike, extra shows in AndhraAhead of 'War 2' release, Jr NTR, in a post, expressed his gratitude to Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu and Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan for their support.

You made my life colourful: Parag Tyagi's note for Shefali on wedding anniversaryOn Tuesday, actor Parag Tyagi marked his 11th wedding anniversary with Shefali Jariwala by sharing a heartfelt note on Instagram. The couple's journey began in 2010 when they first met.

Boney Kapoor's sweet gesture for Sridevi's 27th birthday backfired. See picBoney Kapoor shared a special post on his wife Sridevi's 62nd birth anniversary. He recalled an anecdote about his sweet gesture for his late wife on her 27th birthday.

Balancing Rajinikanth's stardom and story: Coolie director Lokesh Kanagaraj's big test'Coolie' isn't just a gift for Rajinikanth's 50th-year celebration, it's director Lokesh Kanagaraj's boldest gamble yet, balancing superstar swagger, ensemble weight, and a possible sci-fi twist in a saturated gangster genre.

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce's love story: From friendship band to epic romanceTravis Kelce shared insights on his natural romance with Taylor Swift amid media attention. He recalled how he gifted her a friendship bracelet with his number on it.

Court Kacheri review: Strong performances are the USP of this legal dramedyRelease Date:Wed Aug 13, 2025Court Kacheri series review: 'Court Kacheri' is a coming-of-age legal drama focusing on a fractured father-son relationship. The series is currently streaming on SonyLiv.

War 2 release, ticket prices, end credits, advance booking - all you need to knowWar 2 featuring actors Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR releases on August 14, coinciding with actor Rajinikanth's Coolie. Here's a look at the ticket prices, advance booking report, box office prediction, end credits and more.

Mrunal Thakur body-shames Bipasha Basu in old video, calls her manly with musclesAmid rumours of her relationship with actor Dhanush, an old video of Mrunal Thakur is going viral in which she is seen body-shaming Bipasha Basu for looking 'manly'.

Coolie vs War 2 advance booking: Expert says clear win for Rajinikanth's filmAhead of its release, 'Coolie' is leading against Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR's 'War 2' in advance sales. Trade expert Ramesh Bala noted that the Rajinikanth-starrer is estimated to have crossed Rs 80 crore in advance sales.

Did Aamir Khan charge Rs 20 crore for Rajinikanth's Coolie? Here's the truthAs opposed to the viral reports, actor Aamir Khan is not charging anything for his brief role in 'Coolie'. The actor is playing a negative role in the Lokesh Kanagaraj directorial.

From art to mass appeal: Are the National Awards losing relevance? Experts answerNational Awards are facing criticism for favouring commercial blockbusters over indie films. Experts question if the awards still hold their original relevance in today's social media age.

The Nice Guy review: Lee Dong-wook's drama is slow, sweet, and strikingly relevantRelease Date:Fri Jul 18, 2025The Nice Guy Kdrama review: The Lee Dong-wook starrer offers a slow, heartfelt take on the gangster drama genre. It highlights the struggles of family duty and dreams amid harsh realities.

Jennifer Aniston says media coverage of her divorce with Brad Pitt was shamefulActor Jennifer Aniston recently recalled how she was affected by the media scrutiny during her divorce from actor Brad Pitt. She also reflected on how celebrities struggle for privacy when it comes to their personal lives.

Saiyaara OTT release: When and where to watch Ahaan Panday-Aneet Padda filmSaiyaara, which is currently running in theatres, will premiere on OTT in a month's time. The Mohir Suri directorial, starring Ahaan Panday and Aneet Padda, released in theatres on July 18.

39 years after Baghwaan Dada, Hrithik and Rajinikanth to clash at box officeWith Hrithik Roshan's 'War 2' and Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' clashing at the box office, fans recalled the time when Roshan shared screen space with the veteran actor in 'Bhagwaan Dada (1986).

Coolie cast fee: What Rajinikanth, Aamir Khan and Lokesh Kanagaraj earnedAs advance bookings for 'Coolie' soar worldwide, here's a peek at what the members of the film, including director Lokesh Kanagaraj and Superstar Rajinikanth, earned for their contribution to the film.

Kartik Aaryan to play Air Force pilot in Shimit Amin's film Captain India: ReportActor Kartik Aaryan is reportedly set to collaborate with 'Chak De India' director Shimit Amin. He will play the role of an Air Force pilot in the film titled 'Captain India'. Filming will begin in 2026 with locations in India and Morocco.

general news.headline: Pak attack on Army post in J&K's Baramulla foiled, soldier killedThe Indian Army launched a large-scale cordon and search operation in the Uri sector of Baramulla district, foiling a major infiltration attempt.

PM Modi likely to meet Trump next month in US as trade tensions simmerDuring PM Modi's likely visit to New York, plans are afoot to schedule a meeting with US President Donald Trump to iron out issues on trade amid a downturn in ties.

Rajiv Pratap Rudy triumphs in BJP vs BJP Constitution Club election battleBJP leader Rajiv Pratap Rudy has maintained his 25-year-old dominance in the Constitution Club management, seeing off a challenge from his party colleague Sanjeev Balyan.

CCTV shows disabled UP woman chased on deserted road, cops say she was rapedA 21-year-old specially-abled woman was allegedly raped in Uttar Pradesh's Balrampur, police said. The survivor was caught on camera running for her life on a deserted road, with bike-borne men chasing her.

KBC hosts officers Sofiya Qureshi, Vyomika Singh after Op Sindoor, stirs rowColonel Sofiya Qureshi and Wing Commander Vyomika Singh, who were the face of Operation Sindoor and led the media briefings, will appear on a special episode of KBC. A promo of the episode has sparked a controversy. Here is why.

Congress cites '50 sons of 1 man' to claim Varanasi voter fraud. What's the truth?The controversy began after the UP Congress posted on social media a voter list from the Kashmiriganj area of Varanasi's Ward No. 51, claiming that over 50 people were registered as "sons" of a single man, Ramkamal Das.

Why BEST society polls will be first ground test of Uddhav-Raj Thackeray pactThe Shiv Sena (UBT) and Maharashtra Navnirman Sena joining forces could galvanise their core Marathi voters in and around Mumbai and pay off in the BMC polls due this year

Animesh, spoke to the publication about his childhood, upbringing and the relentless pursuit to become better every day. As he builds for the World Championships, here's a detailed look at how he became the fastest man in India.

Meat sale banned in Kalyan on Independence Day, order sparks political stormAs per the KDMC order, all slaughterhouses and shops of licenced butchers of goats, sheep, chickens, and large animals must remain closed for 24 hours from midnight of August 14 till midnight of August 15.

A question Congress needs to answer on sacked Karnataka ministerThe Congress is seeking answers from the Election Commission over electoral rolls. However, it has fired a Karnataka minister for asking pertinent questions on the same issue. What were the troubling questions that made the Congress remove a minister? Will Congress answer the one big question?
Stray Dogs as Pets? Done. Much Before It Was A ClapbackSeven years ago, I adopted my Indie pet, Brownie. The decision was not just driven by love but also by the lack of other humane options.

Shameful is your deceit: Israeli envoy jabs Priyanka Gandhi over genocide claimA war of words broke out between Priyanka Gandhi Vadra and Israeli ambassador to India Reuven Azar after the Congress MP accused the Jewish nation of committing genocide in Gaza. The envoy sharply rejected her claims, calling them shameful.

Aravind Srinivas' Perplexity offers $34.5B to buy Chrome: Story in 5 pointsPerplexity AI has made a surprise $34.5 billion cash bid for Google Chrome, aiming to acquire the browser's billions of users amid an antitrust case that could force Google to sell.

BHU student molested, her friends thrashed while returning from libraryAfter the girl's complaint, the police acted swiftly and arrested the three accused. All of them turned out to be former physical education students of the same university.

Next vice-captain? Does Shubman Gill deserve a spot in T20I team?Star India batter Shubman Gill's name is being widely discussed to make a comeback in the T20I side ahead of the Asia Cup 2025. However, does Gill warrant a place in the current setup with his measured approach remains a big question.

Bihar woman shown as 124 years old in voter roll fumes at poll body, Opposition MPsMinta Devi is a 35-year-old woman living in Bihar's Siwan district and has been added to the state's electoral roll for the first time years after she became eligible to cast a vote.

US regulators blame Indian authorities for failure to serve summons to Gautam AdaniThe status report, reviewed by India Today, shows that while the US financial regulator has been actively attempting to advance the federal lawsuit, the progress has stalled due to procedural bottlenecks involving cross-border legal cooperation.

Court orders case against Union Minister Kirtivardhan Singh in land grab, threat caseAn MP-MLA Court has ordered a case against Union Minister Kirtivardhan Singh, and five others in the land grab and threat case.

Erwin Schrodinger, the man behind the famous cat experiment that questioned realityIn 1935, in a Europe on the brink of war, Erwin Schrodinger trapped an imaginary cat inside a quantum puzzle -- and in doing so, forced the world to question what "real" even means. Here's more about the life of the brilliant physicist who bagged the Nobel prize for wave mechanics, lit the spark behind the DNA double helix discovery, and of course, gave us the famous cat.

sports.headline: West Indies needs to stand up to ICC: Clive LlyodFormer cricketer Clive Lloyd has warned West Indies that they may remain in the World Test Championship's lower tier if a two-tier system starts. Llyod has called for an urgent revamp of the financial structure.

Animesh, spoke to the publication about his childhood, upbringing and the relentless pursuit to become better every day. As he builds for the World Championships, here's a detailed look at how he became the fastest man in India.

Fresh off World Cup success, Divya Deshmukh continues giant-slaying runFresh from her historic Women's World Cup triumph, 19-year-old Divya Deshmukh underlined her status as India's brightest chess prospect with a commanding 10–3 demolition of China's world No. 7 Lei Tingjie at the 2025 Women's Speed Chess Championship, adding another top-ranked scalp to her growing list.

Hope 120, Pakistan 92-all out: Fans fume over 1st ODI series loss in 34 yearsPakistan fans lost their cool at the cricket team after Mohammed Rizwan's side were bowled out for just 92 runs in the series-decider against West Indies. This is the first time that Pakistan have lost an ODI bilateral to West Indies since 1991/92.

Next vice-captain? Does Shubman Gill deserve a spot in T20I team?Star India batter Shubman Gill's name is being widely discussed to make a comeback in the T20I side ahead of the Asia Cup 2025. However, does Gill warrant a place in the current setup with his measured approach remains a big question.

West Indies cricket battles funding crisis as glory days fade into distant memoryWest Indies cricket, once a dominant global force, now faces a deep crisis driven by years of mismanagement, financial instability, and player exodus to lucrative T20 leagues. The decline stems from systemic governance failures, crumbling infrastructure, and a loss of national pride, turning a proud legacy into a cautionary tale.

Shai Hope closes in on Brian Lara with 18th ODI centuryWI vs PAK: Shai Hope scored his 18th ODI century with an unbeaten 120 against Pakistan, surpassing Desmond Haynes and closing in on Brian Lara's record of 19 centuries, helping West Indies post 294 for six in the series decider.

Supreme Court appoints Justice Rao as Bihar Cricket Association ombudsmanThe Supreme Court on Tuesday appointed its retired judge, L. Nageswara Rao, as the ombudsman of the Bihar Cricket Association to address alleged illegal activities by certain office bearers.

ED summons ex-cricketer Suresh Raina for questioning in illegal betting app caseThis summons comes as part of a wider crackdown on illegal betting apps and platforms, many of which have been promoted by celebrities.

Mondo Duplantis breaks pole vault world record for 13th time, clears 6.29mSweden's pole vault superstar Armand "Mondo" Duplantis cleared 6.29 metres at the Gyulai Istvan Memorial in Budapest on Tuesday, breaking the world record for the 13th time in his illustrious career.

Grigor Dimitrov pulls out of US Open with injured chest muscleUS Open 2025: World No. 21 Grigor Dimitrov has withdrawn from the championship due to a chest muscle injury sustained during his Wimbledon fourth-round match against Jannik Sinner.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
